name: Escape Together (itch) (LemonDev)
description:
You woke up in an unknown place. You have to find your friends and team up with them to escape(Look at How to play at the end of the webpage before playing the game)

Made for Brackeys Game-Jam 2022.2

How to play:

  • Press AD keys to move left and right
  • Press W  to climb ladders
  • Press E to interact with buttons etc
  • Press R to restart
  • Press ESC to pause
